summary: "His Dark Materials" is a popular fantasy book series by Philip Pullman, including "Northern Lights" (or "The Golden Compass"), "The Subtle Knife," and "The Amber Spyglass." The story follows Lyra and Will, two kids who travel through different worlds. It has cool stuff like witches and talking animals. The books won many awards and are pretty famous, but some people didn't like how they talked about religion. They've been made into movies and a TV show, and Pullman wrote more stories set in the same universe.
title: His Dark Materials
